vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a new Specific Use Permit for the sale of alcoholic beverages in conjunction with a general merchandise food store 3,500 square feet or less on property zoned a CR-D-1 Community Retail District with a D-1 Liquor Control Overlay, on the southeast corner of North Jim Miller Road and Lake June Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z234-138(WK/CC)
